title: Global Dish 1
method: Prepare all ingredients and wash where necessary.
Cook the main ingredient over medium heat until done (approx. 10–15 minutes).
Adjust seasoning, adding optional spices if desired.
Serve hot with sides of choice.
plating: Serve neatly on a warm plate, garnish with fresh herbs or lemon wedge.
optionalSpiceTweaks: Try garam masala for an Indian twist.
